|chip1 = Marvell;88W8997;M, 88W8997P-NXW2, TMK1130.8JW, 1727 A1P, TW, E005; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "48DHUM03.SBG" and "1744" is silkscreened on the back of the board. :The model number may also be ''Catapult'' ERM997-1 or ERM-997-1.
